oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Interview with Ḥusayn Zayd
مقابلة مع حسين زيد
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Prophets in the Qurʼan
Qurʼan stories
oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSubject: Abraham (Biblical patriarch); Angels; Destruction; Devils; Faith; Fathers; God; Heaven; Iraq; Kings; Miracles; Nimrod (Biblical figure); Pagans; Punishment; Stupidity; Temples; Abraham (Biblical patriarch); Angels; Faith; God's will; Hagar (Biblical figure); Isaac (Biblical patriarch); Ishmael (Biblical figure); Jealousy; Joseph (Son of Jacob); Lot (Biblical figure); Marriage; Mecca; Miracles; Pilgrimage; Pregnancies; Sarah (Biblical matriarch); Slavery; Abraham (Biblical patriarch); Arab countries; Atheists; Conduct of life; Divorce; Hagar (Biblical figure); Hebron (Palestine); Ishmael (Biblical figure); Islam; Israelites; Jordan River; Marriage; Muḥammad, Prophet, 571-633; Palestine; Pilgrimage; Prophets; Wives
oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded on January 18, 1996 with Ḥusayn Zayd, male, born in 1941 in al-Ẓāhirīyah, Palestine and resides in al-Baddāwī Palestinian Refugee Camp, Lebanon.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع حسين زيد في 18 كانون الثاني يناير عام 1996، ذكر، ولد عام 1941 في الظاهرية، فلسطين ويقيم في مخيم البداوي للاجئين الفلسطينيين، لبنان.
